item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Yes, it is possible to do. However it would need to be done manually for each such mission and is rather redundant…
But meh, I am not opposed to adding it (then again, I am just a fellow user so its not like my opinion on that matters).

Also:
http://bvs.wikidot.com/bloodline
explicitly explains that this dialog appears when there is something to find in that mission which the whiteeye jutsu can help with.

item.title: bah
item.content:encoded: I just realised that the WhiteEye effect appears on every mission with an item/ally/event find. Is there a point to including this box on affected missions?
